If $x>22.68$, the value of $g(x)$ becomes more negative and if $x<22.68$, the value of $g(x)$ becomes more positive. Therefore, the minimum value of $\sqrt{x^2+400}+\sqrt{x^2}-120\sqrt{x}$ is $-120\sqrt{22.68}\approx -2753.76$.
